steps.title: Kill Hillock
steps.description: Kill Hillock at the end of the Twilight Strand

steps.title: Get Starting Gems
steps.description: Get Rolling Magma and Elemental Proliferation from Enemy at the Gate quest

reward.name: Rolling Magma
reward.usage_notes: Main damage skill until Armageddon Brand

vendor.name: Elemental Proliferation
vendor.usage_notes: Link to Rolling Magma for area spread

steps.gear_focus: Look for 2+ linked items with blue sockets

steps.title: Get Movement & Totems
steps.description: Get Holy Flame Totem, Flame Wall, Frostblink and Arcane Surge

reward.name: Holy Flame Totem
reward.usage_notes: Excellent single target supplement for bosses

vendor.name: Flame Wall
vendor.usage_notes: Projectiles fired through it gain added fire damage

vendor.name: Frostblink
vendor.usage_notes: Primary movement skill

vendor.name: Arcane Surge
vendor.usage_notes: Link to Frostblink for mana sustain, keep at low level

steps.gear_focus: Need blue sockets for movement setup, check vendor for 2x Goat's Horn

steps.title: Add Combustion Support
steps.description: Get Combustion from The Caged Brute quest and add to setup

reward.name: Combustion
reward.usage_notes: Link to Rolling Magma if you have 3B sockets, otherwise link to totem

vendor.name: Leap Slam
vendor.usage_notes: Secondary movement skill for positioning

vendor.name: Momentum
vendor.usage_notes: Link to Leap Slam for movement speed

steps.gear_focus: Need 3B for Rolling Magma + supports, or use Combustion on totem

steps.title: Add Optional Gems
steps.description: Optionally add Searing Bond after completing Fairgraves

vendor.name: Searing Bond
vendor.usage_notes: Optional additional damage source

steps.gear_focus: Focus on weapon upgrades and socket management

steps.title: Get Herald Auras
steps.description: Add Herald of Thunder and optionally Herald of Ice after Fidelitas

vendor.name: Herald of Thunder
vendor.usage_notes: Activate for lightning damage and chain effects

vendor.name: Herald of Ice
vendor.usage_notes: Optional - activate for cold damage and shattering

vendor.name: Arctic Armour
vendor.usage_notes: Optional - for freeze immunity in cold zones

steps.gear_focus: Look for 3+ linked items with blue sockets
steps.currency_notes: Save currency for upcoming gem purchases

steps.title: Get Core Supports
steps.description: Get Cruelty/Elemental Focus from Sharp and Cruel, purchase utility gems

reward.name: Cruelty
reward.usage_notes: Core damage support - purchase Elemental Focus as alternative

vendor.name: Elemental Focus
vendor.usage_notes: Alternative to Cruelty for damage

vendor.name: Wave of Conviction
vendor.usage_notes: Apply fire exposure to enemies before main attacks

vendor.name: Desecrate
vendor.usage_notes: Creates corpses for Cremation skill

vendor.name: Concentrated Effect
vendor.usage_notes: Damage support for single target

steps.gear_focus: Need more sockets for expanding gem setup
steps.currency_notes: May delay purchases until you have enough alterations

steps.title: Get Auras & Curse
steps.description: Get Flammability from Maramoa, purchase Anger and Determination

reward.name: Flammability
reward.usage_notes: Curse enemies for increased fire damage taken

vendor.name: Anger
vendor.usage_notes: Primary damage aura for fire builds

vendor.name: Determination
vendor.usage_notes: Defensive aura for high physical damage zones

steps.gear_focus: Acquire fire damage craft in Solaris Temple Level 2
steps.currency_notes: Need 8 Transmutes for flat fire damage craft at level 24

steps.title: Get Armageddon Brand & Cremation
steps.description: Get Armageddon Brand from Gravicius, purchase Cremation

reward.name: Armageddon Brand
reward.usage_notes: Replace Rolling Magma as main clearing skill

vendor.name: Cremation
vendor.usage_notes: Main single target skill, requires corpses from Desecrate

steps.gear_focus: Need BBB for Armageddon Brand, BBG/BGR for Cremation
steps.currency_notes: Major power spike with Brand + Cremation combo

steps.title: Get Advanced Supports
steps.description: Get Ignite Proliferation from Dialla, purchase utility gems

reward.name: Ignite Proliferation
reward.usage_notes: Replace Elemental Proliferation with this improved version

vendor.name: Immolate
vendor.usage_notes: Add to Armageddon Brand 4-link for more damage

vendor.name: Cast when Damage Taken
vendor.usage_notes: Link with Immortal Call for defense

vendor.name: Immortal Call
vendor.usage_notes: Auto-cast for physical damage immunity

vendor.name: Faster Attacks
vendor.usage_notes: Link to Leap Slam for faster movement

steps.gear_focus: Final setup: Armageddon Brand + Ignite Proliferation + Combustion + Immolate
